citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
The licensee refused to conduct an inspection with me at 12:55 PM. I spoke directly to the licensee. She wanted me to do
the inspection with her husband who was not home at the time. I told her I would do the inspection with him if he were
home, but since he is not and she is listed as the licensee, she is ultimately responsible. I explained to her the importance
of conducting an inspection and that she is ultimately responsible since she is the licensee and asked her again if she
was refusing to allow an inspection and she again confirmed she was refusing inspection. Not allowing APHIS officials to
conduct an inspection doesn't allow APHIS officials to ensure animal welfare standards are being met. The licensee must
allow APHIS officials to conduct an inspection when those officials show up to conduct an inspection. Correct starting on
9/29/23.
No exit interview was conducted.
End of report.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)  Critical
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
The licensee refused to conduct an inspection with me at 12:55 PM. I spoke directly to the licensee. She wanted me to do 
the inspection with her husband who was not home at the time. I told her I would do the inspection with him if he were 
home, but since he is not and she is listed as the licensee, she is ultimately responsible. I explained to her the importance 
of conducting an inspection and that she is ultimately responsible since she is the licensee and asked her again if she 
was refusing to allow an inspection and she again confirmed she was refusing inspection. Not allowing APHIS officials to 
conduct an inspection doesn't allow APHIS officials to ensure animal welfare standards are being met. The licensee must 
allow APHIS officials to conduct an inspection when those officials show up to conduct an inspection. Correct starting on 
9/29/23. 
 
No exit interview was conducted. 
 
End of report. 
 
 n
